## Ingredients

1.5 cup sugar (grind)

3/4 cup flour

3/4 cup oil

1/3 cup + 2.5 tablespoons cocoa powder

1.5 tsp vanilla essence

3 eggs

1/4 + 1/8 tsp baking powder

1/4 tsp salt

## Directions

Mix sugar, oil, vanilla, eggs in a bowl.

In a seperate bowl mix cocoa, baking powder, salt and flour.

Add dry ingredients to wet and mix together.

Pour into a greased/lined pan. 

Bake for 20-25 mins in 180Â°C preheated oven.
